lender.name: Stephen

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. ~Marianne Williamson

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I loan because the Lord laid it upon my heart. I prayerfully choose those I sponsor....and pray for them throughout the week. God has blessed me so much, it's a joy to share with friends in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor. I love serving the Lord and His people. Each person I meet is a precious child of the Most High God. It is an honor to serve them. My Church is a large Church which Jesus has blessed many times over. For example, in my picture, I am working with several volunteers...we are building a house for a Single Mom and her two boys. Building this house and watching all the people give of their time was a highlight of my work this last year.
